website_summaries.verdict: The D-Link DGL-4500 GamerLounge Xtreme N Gaming Router almost succeeds for home networking and hardcore gamers. It bears a few flaws, among which is a random reset during heavy load that might be the deal breaker.
pros: Network Activity Display offers quick access to a variety of network information
preset with a lot of settings for special services and applications, including games

customer_reviews.title: D-Link DGL-4500 Extreme-N Selectable Dual-Band Gaming Router
customer_reviews.text: The D-Link DGL-4500 GamerLounge Xtreme N Gaming Router offers decent performance and a long list of features for home wireless networking and hardcore gamers. However, it lacks support for simultaneous 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands along with random resets during heavy loads. You may want to wait for a successor to the DGL-4500, or at least a firmware update, before buying it. With the hefty price tag of about $180, we expected better stability. Unless you plan to take advantage of the DGL-4500's GameFuel feature for prioritizing bandwidth for games, we still recommend D-Link's DIR-655 Xtreme N router for its superior performance or the Netgear WNR854T RangeMax for its speed, stability, and price
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Is Something Burning?
customer_reviews.text: This is basically the DIR-655 router with an LED screen on the hood, but side by side I have not experienced any different in game, bit-torrent or general network performance. It has however proven to be the least reliable of the two. I had this router for a month, towards the end it was running very hot, until it literally cooked off. Getting it RMA'd was a hassle--no worse then dealing with Linksys or Netgear though--but they got it back to me the same week, and had upgraded both the hardware and software. Personally I would recommend theover the DGL-4500, it's essentially the same router without all the extra eye candy and at a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Pneumatic Panic

customer_reviews.title: Works Great For Me--But Turn Gamefuel Off If Large Upload
customer_reviews.text: Rounter works fine for me in my gaming center, with 4 PC's linked via Ethernet cables, plus 1 or 2 more via wireless, all off this router. I did not update the firmware, as other reviewers suggested. Only potentially bad thing I noticed is that I was backing up one PC to an online backup service (Mozy) and this router limited the upload rate--even when all other PC's were off. Turning the "Gamefuel" feature of the router off improved--doubled--my upload rate. Never noticed a difference otherwise though, so I generally keep Gamefuel on, and the gamers have never complained of lagging.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weber

customer_reviews.title: What's Not to Like!
customer_reviews.text: This router is like a lamp ... plug it in, set it up, turn it on and information flows to your home office like light from a lamp. Takes about as much care and feeding as a lamp ... effectively none. We purchased this router because our (okay ancient) router was spending more time being re-booted than running. We have an 18 year old who games, two Tivo's, 3 desktops and countless laptops and netbooks (for the other 4 kids and ourselves) all communicating flawlessly with the internet. Couldn't recommend it more ... plug in and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: valim

customer_reviews.title: Supports very fast speeds
customer_reviews.text: Works exceptionally well. A bit hard to learn but rewarding. Actually faster than the new router I bought
customer_reviews.author: Rave

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Router
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this router for a few years now and it has worked perfectly the whole time. I never thought I'd need a new one, but it recently had a very unusual flaw surface: the Samsung Galaxy S4 cell phone causes it to stop functioning. This is a known problem between the S4 and certain D-Link routers, with no fix available for this particular router. Other than that though, it was great!
customer_reviews.author: AJRJNR

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: i've been using this for a few months and rarely needed to restart it. Let's say an average of perhaps once a week. Never did the firmware update because i didn't find it necessary. Haven't had troubles connecting various devices to it. Good coverage too, i have decent signal even in the garage (opposite side of the house and i have it upstairs). It does not bring a user's manual or any instructions on settings, just the basic physical setup.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Too many drops on WiFi
customer_reviews.text: He works fine as regular WiFi rotor but if you want to use it for gaming is better once then this one
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Great Router!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router, because even though my old one worked fine, it wouldn't let my sister and I both be on xbox-live at the same time. After trying a multitude of things to fix my old router, I eventually gave up and bought this one. It works great. It lets 3 people be on xbox live at the same time. It's great for a gamer and for people who stream netflix.
customer_reviews.author: Joleen Valerie

customer_reviews.title: D-link Gaming Router
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to setup but it was very unreliable. It kept dropping connections and having to reboot to fix the issue was not a solution I preferred. Updated the firmware but the issues still were not resolved. I had an earlier version of this router which I loved. The love is not there with this one. Maybe I got a bad one. Any way-buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: 67datroad

customer_reviews.title: Faster and more reliable PS3 uplink!
customer_reviews.text: When our Buffalo Router died, I decided to get a "gaming" router, as we have a PS3 and like to play online with family members who live elsewhere...We have always had trouble with unreliable connections while playing--and it got SO frustrating! This router has fixed that problem completely. I was so surprised--even downloading updates or buying from the Playstation Store is seamless and quick. It's not the most intuitive to set up, and took me awhile, even though I'm relatively computer savvy...but in the end, I figured it out and everything is all set up and working. So far, so good...
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install / configure. Since I got this, online gaming on the PS3 is WAAAAAAAAY faster. I can even stream videos out of my PC onto the PS3 so now I can watch Bleach from my sofa, and that's a lot of episodes! I havent upgraded the firmware, the device is in its factory state and I have 0 complaints. Would highly recommend this router
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Please be warned
customer_reviews.text: This item has issues with wireless, and thats prety much it everything eles is great, but your speed will not stay the same all the time with just on computer hooked up wired i get 20Mbps, and with wireless it veries from 2 to 10 up and down during test. I emailed dlink and gave them chances to replied to me but they just sent out one email to me and then ignored me becused the could not figure it out... i tried with two of the same model, and both no good i am now looking for a diffent router...
customer_reviews.author: Juan J. Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Router For A Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! This router has changed my gaming experience completely.. i noticed a huge difference when i turned on that game fuel! while everyone was surfing the web watching netflix and etc. my game was not lagging one bit i had great connectivity. Im satisfied with this router.... its a great gaming router for its price and if you know how to tweak the settings then you'll even get a better performance from it! i would recommend getting this router if you always have people at your house on the internet while your trying to beat others in online games..
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Everything we hoped for
customer_reviews.text: So I live in a house with three other guys and all of us are gamers. Myself, I prefer console over PC, but my roommates enjoy both. Regardless, the D-Link Extreme N hasn't failed us yet. Not only can we simultaneously have our PCs connected, but also have 3 Xbox 360s that haven't had any trouble. The only trouble we run into is that our ISP will randomly drop, causing data packets to be dropped. The router notifies us when this happens and I can also get a System Log e-mailed directly to me! So far so good. Keep up the good work, D-Link. LONG LIVE ROBOT HOUSE! ERR
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: D-Link Wireless Router
customer_reviews.text: I have had this router for almost 3 years now. I got it primarly for when I was heavy into World of Warcraft where I could adjust the badnwidth for the computer I was using. Now I have 4 laptops, Nintendo Wii, Xbox, and 2 iPhones utilizing this wireless router. I think it is starting to wear down on me and may have to replace it soon. Overall; a solid product!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Luedecking

customer_reviews.title: still a decent unit for budget gamers
customer_reviews.text: For its day it was decent found myself not using the gaming features though after a while. Port forwarding was my favorite thing on this because you can edit each one instead of removing and re adding them manually.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron W Layton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this. 5 years old still running good. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori123

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This router is a huge disappointment. Absolute garbage. Router just loses internet connection for no reason. I had to reboot it 2 to 3 time a day to get things back online. Newer Firmware update didn't help. Save your money. I suppose D-link went the way of Netgear.
customer_reviews.author: GCSandman

customer_reviews.title: Open Ports!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Router! This Item will open your ports needed for XboxLive,Even if you have Multipal Xbox360's! Setup is plug and play! Lan Side is Gigabit! Works with the New Docsis3 Modems and Docsis1/2! Hands Down the Best Router for Gamers/High-def Content. Lag is no longer an Excuse!
customer_reviews.author: S2KMAN

customer_reviews.title: Works Flawless!  Must have for any serious X-Box 360
customer_reviews.text: My brother and I live in the same house and we X-Box, A TON. The rest of the family does FaceBook, Farmvile, Mafia Wars, Downloads Music, etc... We have not had any problems. The two X-Boxes work without problems, with the previous router we constantly had to re-boot, clear DHCP licensing, etc... Not with this router and nobody in the house even notices the difference with gaming traffic getting the priority it deserves, right guys :-D. Anyway if you are having problems with multiple X-Boxes on one internet connection this might just be your solution to a better gaming experience. And oh yeah, even when just one of us is playing the games are much smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Grossi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We had a linksys router before and it sucked. It was horrible. I play world of warcraft and in the middle of a fight it would always boot me out. It was HORRIBLE! So My boyfriend and I decided to buy a D-link. This thing is AMAZING. I've been playing for almost 2 days straight and there is absolutely NO LAG. Honestly, if you are going to spend money on a wireless router, wait and save up for this one because it's worth it. Amazon.com has the best price too. It's definitely worth it. Don't just buy a 70 dollar piece of crap like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: When you're ready to ditch the Linksys and get a real router, this is the choice. It's dependable, fast, and a breeze to set up. It manages the Xbox360 games (I'm never the guy with the red connection on Black Ops) and runs the Netflix streams, my downloading and my surfing without a hitch. In two words: Buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Plaxx

customer_reviews.title: greatest router i ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I am running 4 sometimes 5 xbox's this router gives no disconnection ever. Very happy with purchase. I've spent over 300 dollars the past year trying to find a network solution for all our xbox's finally found this and it does everything i need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Dom Valerio

customer_reviews.title: Xtreme N gaming router
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working good after a month. I get great coverage throughout my house. I have the router upstairs in the front of the house and I am able to get a very good connection downstairs in the back of the house. I have noticed speeds of 130 mbps wireless and 1 gbps wired. The only pitfall is it does not service the game that I play the most.
customer_reviews.author: Justin J. Barnthouse

customer_reviews.title: Not all that great
customer_reviews.text: experience drop signal quite often when there's multiple steady stream happen in my house. Turnning off multiple type of wireless does help, but that feature is part of the product. So that shouldn't be used as an excuse.
customer_reviews.author: D. N.

customer_reviews.title: Not living up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: The router works well but not anywhere near as well as the reviews and description would have you think it does. The price is not to bad on this tho so it is worth it for the price, you get what you pay for?
customer_reviews.author: Dierdra McGill

customer_reviews.title: Good router
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a couple of years and it still works great. My son's room is a dead zone and his cell phone has issues but this router works well. Our old router kept kicking him off XBox live.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: I needed a new one and this was a super sale deal, saved me a lot of bucks
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new one and this was a super sale deal, saved me a lot of bucks and I am very happy with it. You won't find a better sale deal.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Bobb

customer_reviews.title: When it works it is great.
customer_reviews.text: When this router works, it really is an excellent router. The problem that I have had is that when this router is pushed, it locks up and NOTHING gets through. All of a sudden you are unable to do anything on the web, not even browse. Soon as you reset the power on the router, it works great again. This router has to be restarted at least once a week. I have never had a router that required such maintenance. I would not recommend this router, It is way to flaky for reliable use. There are better and more reliable routers for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Northlander

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: He brought all cables, CD, charger, manuals, well packaged. Brought the original 3 antennas, all in good condition, some minor damage comenticos. Fully functional. The format and set and ready to use
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson Valverde

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it wish they come out with a newer one
customer_reviews.author: N. Harber

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend. He had his eye on this for quite a while, and once it came, he was sooo excited!!! I dont know much about this kind of thing, but he loved it, and had it set up 10 minutes after it got here. Works great for his gaming, definitely a great surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Its a Snap to Set up
customer_reviews.text: No problems at all in installing the router with my vista o/s. I was up in running in less than 15 minutes. This is my third D-link router and all are still up and running. I use my old ones as wireless access points. I used to by only Linksys products until they were bought out. A great product and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Murray

customer_reviews.title: love this router
customer_reviews.text: this router always bin great bin using it for got a long long time and still works great in u want a great gaming router or using for land parties this is the router for u
customer_reviews.author: christian nichols

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: It performs well. My only problem is one antenna won't tighten up so it falls down. Other than that the features are good and the coverage is good.
customer_reviews.author: James Morris

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Still using it for online gaming and everyday web surfing. Works excellent! Well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: BuyListenDebate

customer_reviews.title: Won't need another router for while
customer_reviews.text: I'm a very simple person with simple security needs for my home. I bought this to manage my gaming consoles and prioritize my packets. I found this to be more then what I paid for and not just for gaming. It has all the features of a standard router and a very descent firewall with tons of features. Definately an improvement over the last one and ease of use. Great range.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: I owned the 4300 gaming router before this one and loved it. The only reason I switched is because I had my modem on top of my old router and i guess it got too hot and friend on me. Then after getting the 4500 version I noticed that the interface is a lot easier to navigate and they are a lot of kewl new options. I get the same great range that I got before with the 4300 model. I dont have any wireless n items yet so I cant comment on that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Garcia

customer_reviews.title: D-link Xtreme N router
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product mainly because I have a blu-ray and wanted to stream Netflix. I was told that this would be the best router for all my needs. Well I'm not finding that to be true. Everything I have is wireless, computers, games and I had no problems with my computers and my other d-link router. Well my blue ray is wi-fi and the streaming isn't that great with this router. I feel like I just waisted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Dayest

customer_reviews.title: Best gamming router on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down it is the best gaming router available. i gave it 4 stars because the LCD screen is just a fancy thing that has actually no important use. it just have some gauges that give falls numbers, it is also quit expensive. i bought it to replace my 2 stupid routers a 3com officeconnect which keep disconnecting, and a Linksys WRT45G that can't take heavy usage ex: lots of P2P running while playing WoW.
customer_reviews.author: H. M. Hisham

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This gaming router works great! I have 2 tvs with gaming systems on it and both systems can be working online and someone online on the computer all at once with no problems at all!! The price was cheaper than other stores.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiden

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay
customer_reviews.text: If you like the best current conection possible 300mbps this is your right choice. With my DLINK 4500 in wireless N you obtain 300mbps and the video fluid like the water. Of course you need to read the manual (i recommend to DLINK print a short instructions in paper) and start to learn about networks. The instructions to establish the router settings via online are complete but for a novice like me could be complicated. I think that DLINK could translate the manual in different languages because not all the buyers understand very well english. The device is simple but beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Spath

customer_reviews.title: i like this used for my computer
customer_reviews.text: thankyou i like this used for my computer all my house and with security next time i will buy more for this router and save more money thankyou.
customer_reviews.author: minh nguyen

customer_reviews.title: descent  router game fuel is cool
customer_reviews.text: Descent router.... i like the game fuel setting so my ps3 takes priority.....setting up game fuel was rediclous though! More pros than cons!
customer_reviews.author: cdog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great and i have not had any trouble out of it at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie P

customer_reviews.title: Horrendous, notoriously buggy DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This was the Ferrari of routers, then D-Link issued a buggy firmware upgrade almost 9 months ago which turned it into a Ford Pinto. The net is full of customers like myself having problems with the modem requiring resets 2-3 times daily to avoid slow/no wireless connection issues and the manufacturer D-Link is doing nothing to quickly resolve it. A definite DO NOT BUY AT ANY PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was an excellent product for the time! Have since upgraded to higher security product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Crap router
customer_reviews.text: This router says it's for gaming, yet every time I would try to play games online it would block the internet IPs trying to connect so I could play. I wasted my money on this router and suggest you don't waste yours too. I just went ahead and bought the Apple AirPort Extreme which has way better range converge throughout my house and keeps my DL/UL rates rather high. Don't waste money like I did. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: D-link 4500 gaming router
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup , extended my wireless range by at least 30% . Waaaaay better speed and no lag when running two xbox360's on battlefield 3 servers . Cant think of any problems just a great router .
customer_reviews.author: turbovelocity

customer_reviews.title: Great, fast router
customer_reviews.text: This is as fast as I expected, I had no issues setting it up and haven't had any problems with dropped connection like I've read others have had. Amazon has a great price at $125 new. Apparently upgrading the firmware if its working otherwise is a bad idea I've read a lot of others had problems with, but not me as I haven't upgraded, nor will I unless I have a good reason or they issue a reliable version. Mine has 1.14, purchased 12/09. Works great with the Dell wireless N adapter in my M4400, wired connections no issues either. Here's the forum for it from D-Link: [...]
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: The reviews have been all over the place on this router but not sure why. I am not an expert on routers or computers by any means but right out of the box the set up was easy and works great. I highly recommend this D-Link product to anyone from an extreme gamer or someone that just wants extended wireless internet access. As for the rebate, I hope D-Link follows through with me unlike it sounds for others that posted problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: T-Money

customer_reviews.title: D-Link DGL-4500 Gaming Router
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for over 2 years now . My only con is I still have not figured out how to get my Iphone on Wi-Fi with this router. otherwise works great. Intense setup directions for advanced users only
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Marizo

customer_reviews.title: gaming router
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Plenty of options for security and is very fast. Dualband is not at the same time so you cannot choose both at the same time, and only one band works with 802.11g devices. But if this is dedicated for just online gaming with matching wireless adapters, you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Eadeh

customer_reviews.title: Very Fast!
customer_reviews.text: I never tried a Gigabit Wi-Fi router before, even I had tried several brands and models. Until I got this DGL-4500, I noticed very fast network response in both wired and wireless. The setup is very easy, you don't need to touch those advanced features until you get familiar with them. The router runs very stable and fast. Highly recommended to every power user.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chan

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: The firmware came broken, the router itself had problems turning on and the internet was not at a constant output and would go out often. Aside from those issues the Dual Band doesn't send out two signal waves rather than being able to switch between one or the other.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Mills

customer_reviews.title: D-Link router
customer_reviews.text: Love this router. It really speeded up our home network.
customer_reviews.author: LDS

customer_reviews.title: Thought this thing would be better. Maybe my expectations were just too high
customer_reviews.text: Thought this thing would be better. Maybe my expectations were just too high. It's electronics and I'm not so good in that department so take that into consideration as to whether my review matters. But we shut this thing down at least once a week to restart/refresh and that seems to help. We have 5-7 Apple-ish devices that connect in the course of a given day and sometimes a bunch more (we host people at our house a lot) and the machine doesn't exactly love that. Anyway, average to good machine.
customer_reviews.author: bpgil

customer_reviews.title: good router
customer_reviews.text: You will have to tune this router. Don't expect to perform like a champ out of the box. Xbox live requires "dynamic fragmentation" to be unchecked. If your geeky enough to buy this and read what the options are in the advance section then this router is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Vaibhav Chhabra

customer_reviews.title: It worked for a while
customer_reviews.text: This router was great... for a little while, then not so much. After owning this router for a little less than 2 years Its time for a new one. This one constantly drops WI-FI and frequently needs to be reset, some times more than 3 times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cole

customer_reviews.title: Good bits
customer_reviews.text: Thehas been good to date; ordered one some time back, and just got another one for a second relative's household. Good signal strength to 100 yards through the house, and one floor distance, including on the far side of the detached garage and out to the hammock spot. Used to keep an EEE PC happy; works well with the .n speeds with it. Very satisfied with the gigabit wired speeds as well. Not the least expensive available out there, but overall very happy with purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Another who doesn't watch much TV

customer_reviews.title: Serious Gaming
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to upgrade from the DGL-4300. Which in my experience was a great router. I wanted wireless "N" so upgrading to the big brother was a no brainer. It's easy enough for a novice to setup but has a ton of features for those who like to cutomize. The only thing missing which I liked from the older model was the fact that you could filter the MAC using either wired or wireless or both. Otherwise it's a great router and fast as ever. I got it for $[...] shipped. This is a $200 piece of hardware. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed McCutcheon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product.  Used for almost a year now and love it.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this router for nearly a year now with a couple of xbox360's and wifi for my laptop and desktop. I think it's a great product, built well and very fast for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: BOB LADUE

customer_reviews.title: d link wireless router
customer_reviews.text: i bought this router to replace the microsoft unit which was a g router and i was looking for easy install and easy set up and a longer range with no lag and i really got a great unit here i didnt have one lag problem with my 360 and non with my laptop and i have the cox phone internet and tv set up the software for the router was easy to set up i was done in 10 minutes up and going even my son log on to the internet with his ipod and i would buy this item again when they upgrade in the future for faster speeds
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Cuccia

customer_reviews.title: Wired was great, wireless was poor
customer_reviews.text: I found the product has all the features advertised, the wired connection ran well and the gaming was great. The wireless keep rebooting, so for gaming on the wireless or anything else was constant issue with staying connected.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Drake

customer_reviews.title: High End Router
customer_reviews.text: This router is loaded with a lot of features. I am using some of them and learns how to use others. I can see a big increase in through put over previous router. Just follow the included instruction and you won't have problems with setup. I am please with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marsaries

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it
customer_reviews.text: This router is cap it keep shutting off and the wireless keep disconnectin for a home 1400 qf...don't bother with this product. No star for me
customer_reviews.author: lashara jones

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was exceptional.
customer_reviews.text: i believed in this product from just the specs and recommendations. Turns out this was not all that. technicians in the industry were correct. idea sound . application hard on end user me.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Garcia Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Router
customer_reviews.text: Solid router all around, and after the initial set up has been running solid for weeks. Might be a little on the expensive side for some, but the money is well spent as you can tell it's a quality built product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Puleo

customer_reviews.title: WORST ROUTER EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This router is by FAR the worst router I've ever used. Coincidentally, it's also the most expensive. Go figure. I've had this router for over 7 months, through 3 firmware updates, and nothing has improved. I don't think it's ever held a steady connection longer than 3 hours, which, of course, makes it worthless for gaming, or any kind of productivity. All the features would be awesome, if the router itself worked properly, but since it doesn't, who cares about anything else? Do yourself a favor and buy something else. This one needs to be taken off the market.
customer_reviews.author: T. NORTHWEST

customer_reviews.title: Setup takes a little getting used to.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this router for almost 2 months now. The set up has a little bit of a learning curve to it in that I used a Linksys wireless router for about 6 years and was used to where everything was with that make/model. I do like having the Gigabit ports for every device so I get much better throughput to my NAS. This product has a lot of features only a small percentage of which have I really checked out so far. It suits my needs as is.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gaming router.
customer_reviews.text: This router was very easy out of the box. Got our multiple XBOX systems up and running and have had open NAT on both since first day. Very user friendly set-up and use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Flowers

customer_reviews.title: dgl-4500
customer_reviews.text: the best router i ever owned for gaming absolutely no lag i play gears of war and modern warefare 3 and my connection is always flawless i i would recommend this router to any one who is a serious online gamer.
customer_reviews.author: the crow

customer_reviews.title: worked fine and then nothing
customer_reviews.text: it was working great and then quit working after a month wouldnt turn on or anything like it wasnt getting power
customer_reviews.author: Derek C

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, really fast with wireless as well. The range is also very good, overall very satisfied with this product, highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: EJWTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and quick to setup
customer_reviews.text: Took less than 10 minutes to setup our Mac and Windows laptops! It increased the speed of our internet connection!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Garcia

customer_reviews.title: try it you will like it
customer_reviews.text: its very good for games ... i like it because when i play call of duty ghosts no lag and im the host and everything is working good ..
customer_reviews.author: RwganAlharbi

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get all the peices plus it kept dropping the Internet
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hart, Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Keeps up with my sons gaming and still keeps me online glad we upgraded to this router. Great product. Must have for gamers or multiple devices
customer_reviews.author: Judith Kempf

customer_reviews.title: Top dog
customer_reviews.text: This router has been great. Very easy to set up and use. very fast transfers from pc to pc on the net work. I have a 3 pc , xbox 360 , ps3 , and a laptop working together with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: William Cherosnick

customer_reviews.title: NAT problems?
customer_reviews.text: Say no more with this router. I purchased this router for my gaming problems when I try to play Halo3 with my brothers w/our separate Xbox 360's (3) of them. When I plug n played it, set a few wireless settings so no leacher can get free net and walla! Too easy. And with Amazon's quick shipping and great pricing its a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: neihouma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy ordering, easy set up, streaming on my IPhone is lightning fast, Call of Duty is Incredible...never a lag, and never a problem....
customer_reviews.author: Den

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very good one, durable, strong signal, never dropped, my husband loves it, I bought it on sale, it was good price.
customer_reviews.author: Yu Fu

customer_reviews.title: Got what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: I expected a router that was above average and provided excellent wireless signal with little hassle or fuss. I got just that and am pleased with my purchase. There were some slight problems with my desktop not getting access to the internet, usually after extended amounts of game time... but a firmware update seemed to fix that.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: With windows 7 it was hard to set up i need it tecnical support i also need it help with a firmware upgrade this was needed because the router needed to be rebooted constanly that seems to be better after the firmware upgrade . Technical support was good. Now it works good.
customer_reviews.author: Edge

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly like it you would expect a $150 router to work!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product just over a month now and it really doesn't get any easier. We were having frequent disconnects with the previous linksys router, problems have all dissapeared with this beauty. We've had this for over a month and only had to reset the power once, other than that it just works. Would definitely reccomend to anyone interested in a reliable wireless router that saves bandwidth for online gaming(without the hassle-filled setup).
customer_reviews.author: M. Ewald

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming router
customer_reviews.text: My old router was about five years old and I was noticing more lag while playing online games. I figured it was time for an upgrade. This router was a ex lent choice and has actually improved my game. It is easy to set up and the settings can be customized to optimize your gaming even when other devices are being used on your network.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bird

customer_reviews.title: The best router you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest router to set up that I have ever purchased! It works better than I would have imagined!
customer_reviews.author: K. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't hook it up or wouldn't work I think .
customer_reviews.author: Justin Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Great hardware, horrible firmware
customer_reviews.text: When this router worked, it was blazing fast. With any firmware beyond what it came with (1.02), it wouldn't save settings beyond a few changes. Also, it would lock up under heaving gaming load (hosting a Ghost Recon Advanced Warfighter 2 PC coop server). It would also randomly reboot. The router LED seems cool at first, but then you long for standard router activity lights. Do some searching on DGL-4500 firmware before purchasing this, and check out broadbandreports.com. This is a flakey router at best. Amazon was great with the return, though...very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Eanna

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well with my PS3 and Xbox360, and Nintendo Wii, as well on my smartphone. My connection to the internet while playing games online with my video gaming systems works faster than before without any lag.
customer_reviews.author: J. RED

customer_reviews.title: Requires Broadband Modem
customer_reviews.text: Understand that this does not contain a broadband modem built in with the router, which means you can't stick in a dial-up cable in and get internet, you will need to buy one in order to get connected. which means if you do not have one you are going to need to buy one if you are connecting via dial-up cord (phone line). I made the mistake buying the router without the broadband modem.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M

customer_reviews.title: D-Link DGL 4500
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the D-Link 4500. I tried a couple of other routers and it was very complicated to get the NAT set to OPEN. I do some online gaming and a restricted NAT would not allow me to stay connected. The DGL is made for gaming, there was no need to adjust anything as soon as I turned it on, Boom NAT open and game on.The fact that it did not require setup was Awesome...nice job D-Link.
customer_reviews.author: SevenX714

customer_reviews.title: Awesome router
customer_reviews.text: This router was one of the best wireless routers that i have bought. I was able to run my three Xbox 360's my houses Five different labtops and my dvd player which is also attached. i am able to use all of these things at the same time without losing peformance on anything. which healped me keep everyone from fighting with each other over their connection speed
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: This product is trash
customer_reviews.text: It worked good for about a week. Then after that, you have to reboot it every other day. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Reset, reset, reset!
customer_reviews.text: All I can really say is even after a firmware update this thing never worked properly. Extremly happy with Amazon's return policy! Ordered a Linksys and waiting for it to arrive! My advice is to research this product for problems before you decide to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: JScott

customer_reviews.title: Awesome router!
customer_reviews.text: NO resetting this thing, it stays up and running on my demanding home network (2 Xboxs, Wii, 3 desktops, 2 laptops, and at least 3 mobile devices at any given time). One of, if not the best router on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Router Review
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are non-existent. It is very difficult to figure out. We got so upset, we undid the beginnings of installation and have not re-installed it yet. We are sorry we ordered this.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Malin

customer_reviews.title: good router
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this router and it is really great in the 2.4 ghz range but sucks in the 5.0 range. But in 2.4 Ghz it is amazing. It runs my 3 xbox 360's(1 wired and 2 wireless) and 3 computers(also1 wired and 2 wireless). Well worth the money, XBOX RULES!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Breshears

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this router and was worried after some people said they had connection issues. I got this thing set up in 10 mins with my new modem, and in the two weeks I have had it on Ive been getting blazing speeds. When I play xbox I have no lag, and my connection has not dropped once.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

product_meta.title: D-Link DGL-4500 Extreme-N Selectable Dual-Band Gaming Router
product_meta.description:
With dualband Wireless N technology (2.4GHz or 5GHz) gamers can choose which wireless band works best for them. In order to get the best out of your game, the Xtreme N Gaming Router includes an updated GameFuel™ Priority Engine to prioritize your gaming traffic on the network and get your game going smoother. The DGL-4500/RE also includes Gigabit LAN and WAN ports to get your game on with incredible speeds. Information is key, with that in mind we’ve included the Network Activity Display to give you vital information about your router and network all at the touch of a button.

AMAZON.COM




FROM THE MANUFACTURER



It's not everyday you come across a device designed solely with the gamer in mind. The D-Link Xtreme N Gaming Router (DGL-4500) is one of those few devices built especially for gamers. Experience the power of our Xtreme N Duo wireless technology for data transfer rates of up to 300Mbps** and Gigabit LAN and WAN Ports to get your game on faster than ever before. 

We've also added an updated version of our award-winning GameFuel technology to get your game going smoother. To top it off, we've thrown in a high-performance CPU and a Network Activity Display to give you a serious gaming router.



The D-Link Xtreme N Gaming Router (see larger image).



Rear view (see larger image).



Network activity display (see larger image).

KEY FEATURES
 * Wireless N connectivity for superior wireless performance, clarity, and coverage  
   
   
 * Intelligent QoS technology prioritizes both wired and wireless Internet traffic to enable enhanced gaming and phone calling (VoIP) experience  
   
   
 * Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS) for secure, simple 1-button setup  
   
   
 * Capable of streaming audio and video to compatible UPnP-enabled devices  
   
   
 * Dualband 802.11n technology (2.4 GHz or 5 GHz) for getting your game on in the wireless band of your choice  
   
   
 * Active Firewall protection  
   
   
 * 4 Gigabit Ethernet LAN ports for ultra-fast wired connectivity  
   
   
 * Network Activity Display that gives you vital information about your router and network settings 
 * Updated GameFuel Engine to keep your game going smoother 
 * Backward compatible with 802.11a/g/b devices 
 * D-Link Green Verified Product (hardware version A1 and A2) 
 * Includes SharePort technology* for sharing USB devices like printers and storage over your network 

GAMEFUEL PRIORITY
Nothing ruins a frag-fest faster than lag. GameFuel allows you to customize your network settings to prioritize game traffic so your roommate doesn't hog all the bandwidth while downloading tracks from his favorite 80's hair band.



NETWORK ACTIVITY DISPLAY
You can never have too much information. That's why we've included a Network Activity Display to show you what's going on with your router. Check your Internet, LAN, WAN and other various settings all from one screen. We've also included a clock in there so you can see exactly how long you've spent playing the game and not taking out the trash.

The D-Link DGL-4500 includes a network activity display that gives you vital information about your router and network settings. Click here to see more.

XTREME WIRELESS
Playing by yourself can be fun, but getting online and fragging others is way better. Make sure your wireless signal can make it into the basement with our Xtreme N Duo wireless technology**. With Xtreme N Duo technology your router also has the power of dual-band (2.4 or 5 GHz) wireless signals to get your game on in the wireless band of your choice.

SHAREPORT
With SharePort technology you can connect a USB printer or storage device to your router and allow users to access them from anywhere on the network. Conveniently turn your existing USB printers and storage devices into network devices for everyone to share. GIGABIT GAMING
Push the limits of networking technology and experience the evolution of gigabit speed. Share broadband Internet, boost network performance and stay competitive in your online games.

 What's in the Box


Xtreme N gaming router, 3 detachable antennas, Ethernet cable, power adapter, CD-ROM with installation wizard, product documentation, and World in Conflict content


* Requires SharePort Client Utility installation on the PC. SharePort upgrade is available for the hardware versions A1, A2.

** Maximum wireless signal rate derived from IEEE Standard 802.11g, 802.11a, and 802.11n specifications. Actual data throughput will vary. Network conditions and environmental factors, including volume of network traffic, building materials and construction, and network overhead, lower actual data throughput rate. Environmental factors will adversely affect wireless signal range.





See more

You can never have too much information. That's why we've included a Network Activity Display to show you what's going on with your router.
Playing by yourself can be fun, but getting online and fragging others is way better.
Router also has the power of dualband (2.4 or 5GHz) wireless signals to get your game on in the wireless band of your choice.
Push the limits of networking technology and experience the evolution of gigabit speed.
